Summary Note:
The RM first met Dekkers Visser Jansen at a luxury car show in Amsterdam. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
Having worked for over 37 years, Dekkers Visser Jansen brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Dekkers Visser Jansen and Eva have been married since 1993. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Dekkers received his secondary school diploma from Bonaventura College Leiden in 1983.
Dekkers earned his degree from Tio University of Applied Sciences in 1987.
Occupation History:
Dekkers Visser Jansen is a 61 year old retired VP of Business Development from Netherlands. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Dekkers Visser Jansen's first role was as a Aerospace Engineer at Airbus Netherlands B.V., where he worked diligently from 1988 to 1993 to establish a strong reputation.
He then transitioned to Stork Aerospace B.V. as a Program Manager, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1993 to 1995.
His tenure as a Director of Operations at NLR - Netherlands Aerospace Centre from 1996 to 1998 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
His next role was as a VP of Business Development at Fokker Technologies B.V., where he applied his extensive experience to drive innovation from 1998 till retirement.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 1690000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He owns villa in Groningen, where he resides. It is worth 2410000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns townhouse in Eindhoven worth 1104000 EUR.

Moreover, he has invested in additional property in Assen, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The house is valued at 1376000 EUR.

He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
